A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unbelievably bad writing and direction. No meaningful story arc. Every plot point is nonsense. Every scene in in some way defies reasoning. No character development. No relatablity. No continuity.  Ignores everything we already understand about this universe. Some decent acting and special effects\, as expected with a movie with this budget. The rest is a steaming pile of hot postmodern garbage.
